name: Easy Smart Grid GmbH
goal:
Easy Smart Grid develops energy management solutions to migrate electricity systems from fossils to renewables. The solutions have higher performance (stability, resiliency, data and cyber security) and lower cost. They are used to operate island grids, local energy communities and industrial sites in the most cost-efficient way

Easy Smart Grid entwickelt Energiemanagementlösungen zur Migration von fossiler zu erneuerbarer Energie. Diese Lösungen sind performanter (Stabilität, Resilienz, Daten- und Cybersicherheit) und kostengünstiger als konventionelle Lösungen. Sie werden für Inselnetze, lokale Energiegemeinschaften und Industrieanwendungen eingesetzt.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Cleaner and cheaper energy on European islands, Cyber secure energy systems, EIT Digital, Climate protection, Decentralized energy systems /local energy communities, Clean energy package/customer centric energy/dynamic end customer tariffs, Partnership with Africa/India, World Alliance for Efficient Solutions
